column2: ncluding  the  Petitioner  and  the  1st  and  2nd  Respondents,  and

column1: make a suitable order in terms of the law.
The only submission made by the 1st and 2nd Respondents is the
application  of  the  Petitioner  shall  be  dismissed  in  limine  on  the
ground of delay.  In my view, in the facts and circumstances of
this case, such a submission cannot succeed.  As I have stated
above,  the  Petitioner  repeatedly  took  up  this  matter  with  the
postponing  the  holding  of  an  inquiry  and  failed  to  make  an
appropriate decision, due to the case filed by the 1st Respondent
The application of the Petitioner is partly allowed.  No costs.
